column2:
"Great job!
I've just received notice from the girls
to thank you!"

"The outlook of the chocolate this year
has been set so it's time to move on to
the next step!"

"Thank you for your help!
Please help us again when there is a
chance!"

"おつかれさまっ！
彼女たちからも感謝の連絡が来てるよ！"

"これで今年もチョコレートの
目処は立ったから、次の段取りへ
進まないと！"

"いつもいつもありがとね！
またよろしくっ！"
